column2: ALPHA BLACK TO PAPA BEAR. WE HAVE GOT CONTROL OF THIS HILL. AA THREAT NEUTRALIZED. ALPHA OUT.
PAPA BEAR BE ADVICED, WE HAVE ENEMY REINFORCEMENTS DETECTED IN EAST OF AA SITE. REQUESTING IMMEDIATE BACKUP. OVER.
BRAVO BLACK TO ALPHA BLACK. HOLD TIGHT ETA ONE MINUTE. OVER.
COPY THAT ALPHA. STAY PUT AND STAY SHARP. OVER.
ROGER ALPHA. WE ARE DISPATCHING INFANTRY SQUAD TO BACK YOU UP. HANG THIGHT. PAPA BEAR OUT.
